Package com.sindice.query

This package contains all the classes modeling the various queries on Sindice.com

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
HTTPParameter This interface provides a custom mechanism for generating the HTTP parameters string from the implementing class.
 

Class Summary
AdvancedQuery This class models an advanced query to Sindice.com.
CacheQuery Specific query implementation to access the Sindice Cache service.
FieldRegexFilter For the named field, filter to include / exclude only the items matching the given regular expression.
Query Base class for any query performed on the Sindice API endpoint.
SearchQuery It models a generic query to Sindice.
TermQuery This class models a term query.
 

Enum Summary
CacheQuery.ResponseFormat The response output format.
FieldRegexFilter.Type Type of filter.
 

Annotation Types Summary
CacheQuery.ParameterMapping This annotation allows to declare the mapping of the target field with a JSON object key.
 

Package com.sindice.query Description

This package contains all the classes modeling the various queries on Sindice.com
